Contact Sign Up

For all things cloud contact center, we're the experts you turn to

We’ve catered to medium to large-scale enterprises in different industries, namely retail, healthcare, and even government offices like SMRT and NTUC.

And though we’ve been around since 2006, we still operate with the tenacity of a startup. We’re a small team, but we’ve been providing VOIP telephony solutions to clients based in Singapore, Malaysia, and–quite recently– Australia. And we’re still growing!

At a Glance

Nautilus is recognized by the Infocomm Development Authority (IDA) of Singapore.
Nautilus abides by the principles of the Kaizen Project.
Licensed with IMDA Singapore as a registered cloud telecommunications provider.
We hold the ISO 27001 Standard Certification, the international standard for internet security best practices.
We are also certified with the Data Protection Essentials, a key initiative for SMBs in Singapore that promotes cybersecurity and safe handling of data.

Our Story

One thing that’s definitely helped out in our growth is our enduring partnerships with major brands like Zendesk and Google. As resellers and tech allies, we share the same values and belief systems that revolve around the same principles:

Respect
Accountability
Empowerment
Integrity
Enrichment
Quality

As a team, we’ve always believed in the idea of a fully-remote workspace, which is why we have team members based in Singapore, Malaysia, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Canada, and the Philippines.

See what we stand for.

That’s why we worked hard to develop the right telephony solution designed to help enterprises to run their operations remotely without compromising anything. We believe our product does just that.

Choose to connect better.
Start your Nautilus Journey

The Nautilus Team.

We’re made up of a group of passionate individuals who are bent on making cloud transitions easier, faster, and more secure.

Meet our team

VISION

To become the provider of cutting-edge systems that lead to improved communications experiences for all users.

MISSION

We’re in the business of making cloud communications easy, secure, and transformative. We do that with the right mix of customer support, ongoing R&D, and a fervent focus on secure architecture.

The Nautilus Timeline

2007
Company was founded
2012
We started offering IP phones
2013
ISO 27001 certification granted
2014
Moved into the company office at Shaw Tower, SG
2016
Nautilus Cloud Telephony was developed

We are committed to making every cloud journey easy and painless.

That’s why our solutions are designed to be stable, secure, and completely tailor-made for every customer.

The goal is this: to allow companies to grow using the best cloud communications platform in the market today.

Let’s start your cloud journey today.

Don’t take it from us

We’re only as good as the experiences that we offer. And who better to hear it from but our customers themselves!
